thread.title: Chiefs’ Travis Kelce Rips Ref After Game ‘He Shouldn’t Even Be Allowed To Work At A F*cking Footlocker’
thread.title_full: Chiefs’ Travis Kelce Rips Ref After Game ‘He Shouldn’t Even Be Allowed To Work At A F*cking Footlocker’

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Chiefs’ Travis Kelce Rips Ref After Game ‘He Shouldn’t Even Be Allowed To Work At A F*cking Footlocker’
text:
During tonight’s Chiefs-Steelers playoff game, the Chiefs had a late two-point version that would have tied the game negated by a holding penalty. 
The Chiefs ended up losing the game because of the call and tight end Travis Kelce wasn’t happy about it. 
Here is Kelce ripping the ref after the game. 
Kelce says that ref should never ref again pic.twitter.com/dXyHeJcmTt 
— Arrowhead Pride (@ArrowheadPride) January 16, 2017 

“He shouldn’t ever wear a zebra jersey again, shouldn’t even be allowed to work at fucking foot locker”
Not sure why Kelce is mad, after watching the replay it didn’t seem like a bad call.
